text: Jersey Girl is a 2004 American drama-comedy movie. It was written and directed by Kevin Smith. It was produced by Scott Mosier. It stars Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Raquel Castro, George Carlin, Jason Biggs, Jennifer Lopez, Stephen Root, and Will Smith. Jason Lee, Matt Damon, and Betty Aberlin had cameo appearances. It was released on March 26, 2004 to negative reviews. Critic Roger Ebert thought the movie was good, however, because he gave it 3.5 out of 4 stars. For full details see Jersey Girl (2004 film). title: Jersey Girl (2004 movie)
